WorkItem.Summary: BidirectionalGraph.ContainsEdge(TVertex source, TVertex target) has a bug..

Comments.Message:
This can not be correct!  If sourceEdge is not in the graph an exception is thrown. This is clearly WRONG.

CORRECT SOLUTION:
1) Check if Source Edge is in the Graph.
2) if not in Graph, return FALSE
3) If it is in graph, check to see if Target is in Source.TargetEdges.
Humm, you are right I can fix that.
